author: Dennis Riungu
name: Flutter VSTS
description: A Flutter Visual Studio Services extension to test and build android and ios applications built using Flutter

inputs.name: flutterCommand
inputs.label: Flutter Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: ex: The Flutter command to run. Either 'run' or 'build', resulting to 'flutter test' and 'flutter build' respectively

inputs.name: build-configuration
inputs.label: Build Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Build configuration to use. either debug or release, resulting to '--debug' and '--release' respectively

inputs.name: Clean
inputs.label: Clean
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, will remove previously downloaded flutter runtimes and use clone command to download Flutter afresh. Otherwise, it will use the exisiting Flutter runtimes.
